testCaseName: Verify if an user can set the same [Full Name] and [Email] in SignUp modal.
name: Verify if an user can set the same [Full Name] and [Email] in SignUp modal.
description: This test case is to verify if the user can enter an email in [Full Name] field and repeat the same input in [Email] field.
